title: Multiple winners of FIFA football Ballon d'Or 1956 to 2019
summary: The statistic gives information on the collective time FIFA winners users spent using its services in the fiscal periods from Ronaldo_(Brazil) to Lionel_Messi_(Argentina) .
In the fiscal year ending in Lionel_Messi_(Argentina) , users listened to an aggregate amount of 6 million awards of streamed music via FIFA .
In Lionel_Messi_(Argentina) , 32 % of consumers in the country stated that they had used the service in the last Month and a further 23 % had used it in the last week .
gold: The Ballon d'Or is an annual football prize presented by France Football . The award , voted for by football journalists , is given to the male player who was deemed to have played the best football over the previous 12 months . Unsurprisingly , two of the greatest footballers of all time , Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo , top the list of all-time winners .
